definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :2Ki 2:24 (seld.) bear (from soft or gliding motion, NH id., Eth. db: As. dabû (?) Dl:S 55; Aram. [[דּוּבָּא]], debo0; Ar. dub=un, dub=ah;un, is however a loan-word cf. Hom:NS 301 f.);—abs. [[דּׂב]] Am 5:19 + 5 t.; [[דּוֹב]] 1Sa 17:34 + 2 t.; pl. [[דֻּבִּים]] 2Ki 2:24, Is 59:11; —bear, female 2Ki 2:24, 2Sa 17:8, Pr 17:12, Ho 13:8 cf. Is 11:7; undetermined 1Sa 17:34, 1Sa 17:36, 1Sa 17:37, Am 5:19, Pr 28:15, Is 59:11, La 3:10, La 3:10 (on art. 1Sa 17:34, Am 5:19 cf. RS:Sem, i. 119 n.)
